018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_DuplicateOptionName;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_InvalidCLIType;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_NoArgumentIndex;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_NoOptionName;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.ELEMENTTYPE_IS_ENUM;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_CLI_MANDATORY;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_CLI_MULTIVALUED;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_OPTION;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_CLIDefinitions;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_CLIError;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_WriteLock;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_GetRessourceBundle;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.BOOLEAN;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.REDUNDANT_EXPLICIT_VARIABLE_TYPE;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.createSuppressWarningsAnnotation;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.DebugOutput.ifDebug;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
044import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
045import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.capitalize;
046import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
047
048import java.io.IOException;
049import java.io.OutputStream;
050import java.util.ArrayList;
051import java.util.Collection;
052import java.util.HashMap;
053import java.util.HashSet;
054import java.util.List;
055import java.util.Map;
056import java.util.Optional;
057import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
058
059import org.apiguardian.api.API;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.ap.IllegalAnnotationError;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CmdLineException;
063import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigUtil;
064import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CollectionKind;
065import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec;
066import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.cli.CmdLineValueHandler;
067import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.cli.SimpleCmdLineValueHandler;
068import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal.ClassRegistry;
069import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIArgumentDefinition;
070import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIDefinition;
071import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIOptionDefinition;
072import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ArrayTypeName;
073import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
074import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.FieldSpec;
075import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.LambdaSpec;
076import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
077import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
078import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.WildcardTypeName;
079import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
080
081/**
082 *  The
083 *  {@linkplain org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder code builder implementation}
084 *  for the CLI stuff, as defined in
085 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec}.
086 *
087 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
088 *  @version $Id: CLIBeanBuilder.java 1053 2023-03-11 00:10:49Z tquadrat $
089 *  @UMLGraph.link
090 *  @since 0.1.0
091 */
092@SuppressWarnings( "OverlyCoupledClass" )
093@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CLIBeanBuilder.java 1053 2023-03-11 00:10:49Z tquadrat $" )
094@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.1.0" )
095public final class CLIBeanBuilder extends CodeBuilderBase
096{
097        /*------------*\
098    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
099        \*------------*/
100    /**
101     *  The handler classes.
102     */
103    private final Map<TypeName,ClassName> m_HandlerClasses = new HashMap<>();
104
105        /*--------------*\
106    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
107        \*--------------*/
108    /**
109     *  Creates a new instance of {@code CLIBeanBuilder}.
110     *
111     *  @param  context The code generator context.
112     */
113    public CLIBeanBuilder( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
114    {
115        super( context );
116
117        for( final var entry : ClassRegistry.m_HandlerClasses.entrySet() )
118        {
119            m_HandlerClasses.put( TypeName.from( entry.getKey() ), ClassName.from( entry.getValue() ) );
120        }
121    }   //  CLIBeanBuilder()
122
123        /*---------*\
124    ====** Methods **==========================================================
125        \*---------*/
126    /**
127     *  {@inheritDoc}
128     *  <p>This method checks whether there are any properties that are either
129     *  options or arguments, and does the build only when there is at least
130     *  one.</p>
131     *  <p>Not building CLI stuff will let crash the compilation of the
132     *  generated code, but this is intended: either the annotation for the
133     *  CLI properties is missing, or the interface
134     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec}
135     *  was added to the configuration bean specification in error.</p>
136     */
137    @Override
138    public final void build()
139    {
140        var doBuild = false;
141        for( final var iterator = getProperties(); iterator.hasNext() && !doBuild; )
142        {
143            final var property = iterator.next();
144            doBuild = property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_OPTION ) || property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT );
145        }
146        if( doBuild ) doBuild();
147    }   //  build()
148
149    /**
150     *  Composes the code that creates the CLI value handler for the given
151     *  property.
152     *
153     *  @param  property    The property.
154     *  @return The name of the method that creates the CLI value handler for
155     *      this property.
156     */
157    private final String composeValueHandlerCreation( final PropertySpec property )
158    {
159        //---* The method name *-----------------------------------------------
160        final var retValue = format( "composeValueHandler_%s", capitalize( property.getPropertyName() ) );
161
162        final var objectType = WildcardTypeName.subtypeOf( Object.class );
163        final var handlerType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( CmdLineValueHandler.class ), objectType );
164        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder();
165
166        final ParameterizedTypeName lambdaType;
167        final LambdaSpec lambda;
168
169        if( property.isCollection() )
170        {
171            if( property.getCollectionKind() == CollectionKind.MAP )
172            {
173                throw new IllegalAnnotationError( format( "Property '%s' is a map of type '%s'; maps are currently not supported for CLI properties", property.getPropertyName(), property.getPropertyType().toString() ) );
174            }
175
176            //---* Determine the element type of the collection *--------------
177            final var elementType = property.getElementType()
178                .orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalAnnotationError( format( "Cannot determine element type for property '%s'", property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
179
180            //---* The lambda that adds the value to the attribute *-----------
181            lambdaType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( BiConsumer.class ), ClassName.from( String.class ), elementType );
182            lambda = getComposer().lambdaBuilder()
183                .addParameter( "propertyName" )
184                .addParameter( "value" )
185                .addCode( "$N.add( value )", property.getFieldName() )
186                .build();
187
188            //---* Get the StringConverter for the element type *--------------
189            final var stringConverter = property.getStringConverterClass()
190                .or( () -> getStringConverter( elementType ) )
191//                .or( () -> )
192                .orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalAnnotationError( format( "Property '%1$s': cannot find StringConverter for '%2$s'", property.getPropertyName(), elementType.toString() ) ) );
193
194            switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter, property.hasFlag( ELEMENTTYPE_IS_ENUM ) ) )
195            {
196                case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, $3T.INSTANCE )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter );
197                case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, new $3T() )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter );
198                case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, new $3T( $4T.class ) )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter, property.getPropertyType() );
199            }
200        }
201        else
202        {
203            //---* The lambda that sets the value to the attribute *-----------
204            lambdaType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( BiConsumer.class ), ClassName.from( String.class ), property.getPropertyType().box() );
205            lambda = getComposer().lambdaBuilder()
206                .addParameter( "propertyName" )
207                .addParameter( "value" )
208                .addCode( "$N = value", property.getFieldName() )
209                .build();
210
211            //---* Retrieve the class for the value handler *------------------
212            final var valueHandlerClass = retrieveValueHandlerClass( property );
213            //noinspection OverlyLongLambda
214            valueHandlerClass.ifPresentOrElse(
215                t -> builder.addStatement( "final $T retValue = new $T( lambda ) ", handlerType, t ),
216                () ->
217                {
218                    final var stringConverter = property.getStringConverterClass()
219                        .orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalAnnotationError( format( "No String converter for property '%s'", property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
220                    switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter, property.isEnum() ) )
221                    {
222                        case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, $3T.INSTANCE )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter );
223                        case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, new $3T() )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter );
224                        case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, new $3T( $4T.class ) )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter, property.getPropertyType() );
225                    }
226                });
227        }
228
229        //---* Compose the method *--------------------------------------------
230        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( retValue )
231            .addModifiers( PRIVATE, FINAL )
232            .addJavadoc(
233                """
234                Creates the value handler for the property &quot;$L.&quot;.
235                """, property.getPropertyName() )
236            .returns( handlerType, "The value handler." )
237            .addCode(
238                """
239                $L
240                """, createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), REDUNDANT_EXPLICIT_VARIABLE_TYPE ) )
241            .addStatement( "final $T lambda = $L", lambdaType, lambda )
242            .addCode( builder.build() )
243            .addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
244            .build();
245        addMethod( method );
246
247        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
248        return retValue;
249    }   //  composeValueHandlerCreation()
250
251    /**
252     *  Creates the implementation for the method
253     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec#dumpParamFileTemplate(OutputStream)}.
254     */
255    private final void createDumpParamFileTemplate()
256    {
257        final var arg = getComposer().parameterBuilder( OutputStream.class, "outputStream", FINAL )
258            .build();
259        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "dumpParamFileTemplate" )
260            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
261            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
262            .addParameter( arg )
263            .returns( VOID )
264            .addException( IOException.class )
265            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
266            .addStatement( "$T.dumpParamFileTemplate( $N, $N )", ConfigUtil.class, getField( STD_FIELD_CLIDefinitions ), arg )
267            .build();
268        addMethod( method );
269    }   //  createDumpParamFileTemplate()
270
271    /**
272     *  Creates the implementation for the method
273     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec#parseCommandLine(String[])}.
274     *
275     *  @param  registry    The registry of the properties that are exposed for
276     *      the CLI.
277     *  @param  errorMsgHolder  The field for the parse errors.
278     */
279    private final void createParseCommandLine( final FieldSpec registry, final FieldSpec errorMsgHolder )
280    {
281        final TypeName typeName = ArrayTypeName.of( String.class );
282        final var arg = getComposer().parameterBuilder( typeName, "args", FINAL )
283            .build();
284        final var methodBuilder = getComposer().methodBuilder( "parseCommandLine" )
285            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
286            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
287            .addParameter( arg )
288            .returns( BOOLEAN )
289            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
290            .addStatement( "var retValue = true" );
291        if( isSynchronized() )
292        {
293            methodBuilder.beginControlFlow(
294            """
295                try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
296                """, getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ) );
297        }
298        else
299        {
300            methodBuilder.beginControlFlow(
301            """
302                try
303                """ );
304        }
305        methodBuilder.addStatement( "$T.parseCommandLine( $N, $N )", ConfigUtil.class, registry, arg )
306            .addStatement( "$N = null", errorMsgHolder )
307            .nextControlFlow(
308                """
309
310                catch( final $T e )
311                """, CmdLineException.class )
312            .addStatement( "$N = e.getLocalizedMessage()", errorMsgHolder )
313            .addStatement( "retValue = false" )
314            .endControlFlow()
315            .addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
316            .build();
317
318        final var method =methodBuilder.build();
319
320        addMethod( method );
321    }   //  createParseCommandLine()
322
323    /**
324     *  Creates the implementation for the method
325     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec#printUsage(OutputStream, CharSequence)}.
326     *
327     *  @param  registry    The registry of the properties that are exposed for
328     *      the CLI.
329     */
330    private final void createPrintUsage( final FieldSpec registry )
331    {
332        final var arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( OutputStream.class, "outputStream", FINAL )
333            .build();
334        final var arg1 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( CharSequence.class, "command", FINAL )
335            .build();
336        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "printUsage" )
337            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
338            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
339            .addParameter( arg0 )
340            .addParameter( arg1 )
341            .returns( VOID )
342            .addException( IOException.class )
343            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
344            .addStatement( "$T.printUsage( $N, $N(), $N, $N )", ConfigUtil.class, arg0, getMethod( STD_METHOD_GetRessourceBundle ), arg1, registry )
345            .build();
346        addMethod( method );
347    }   //  createPrintUsage()
348
349    /**
350     *  Creates the implementation for the method
351     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec#retrieveParseErrorMessage()}.
352     *
353     *  @param  errorMsgHolder  The field for the parse errors.
354     */
355    private final void createRetrieveParseErrorMessage( final FieldSpec errorMsgHolder )
356    {
357        final var typeName = ParameterizedTypeName.from( Optional.class, String.class );
358        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "retrieveParseErrorMessage" )
359            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
360            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
361            .returns( typeName )
362            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
363            .addStatement( "return $T.ofNullable( $N )", Optional.class, errorMsgHolder )
364            .build();
365        addMethod( method );
366    }   //  createRetrieveParseErrorMessage()
367
368    /**
369     *  Is called by
370     *  {@link #build()}
371     *  to do the work – only if there is work to do …
372     */
373    private final void doBuild()
374    {
375        //---* Create the registry for the CLI definitions *-------------------
376        final var registryType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( List.class ), TypeName.from( CLIDefinition.class ) );
377        final var registry = getComposer().fieldBuilder( registryType, STD_FIELD_CLIDefinitions.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
378            .addJavadoc(
379                """
380                The registry for the CLI definitions
381                """ )
382            .initializer( "new $T<>()", ArrayList.class )
383            .build();
384        addField( STD_FIELD_CLIDefinitions, registry );
385
386        //---* Create the field for the CLI parsing errors *-------------------
387        final var errorMsgHolder = getComposer().fieldBuilder( String.class, STD_FIELD_CLIError.toString(), PRIVATE )
388            .addJavadoc(
389                """
390                The last error message from a call to
391                {@link #parseCommandLine(String[])}.
392
393                @see #retrieveParseErrorMessage()
394                """ )
395            .initializer( "null" )
396            .build();
397        addField( STD_FIELD_CLIError, errorMsgHolder );
398
399        //---* Add the methods from CLIBeanSpec *------------------------------
400        createDumpParamFileTemplate();
401        createParseCommandLine( registry, errorMsgHolder );
402        createPrintUsage( registry );
403        createRetrieveParseErrorMessage( errorMsgHolder );
404
405        /*
406         * The names of previously encountered options, collected to avoid
407         * collisions.
408         */
409        final Collection<String> alreadyUsedOptions = new HashSet<>();
410
411        //---* Add the code to the constructor *-------------------------------
412        final var objectType = WildcardTypeName.subtypeOf( Object.class );
413        final var handlerName = "valueHandler";
414        final var handlerType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( CmdLineValueHandler.class ), objectType );
415
416        final var definitionName = "cliDefinition";
417
418        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder().add(
419                """
420    
421                /*
422                 * Initialise the CLI definitions.
423                 */
424                """ )
425            .addStatement( "$T $L", handlerType, handlerName )
426            .addStatement( "$T $L", CLIDefinition.class, definitionName );
427
428        CLIPropertiesLoop:
429        for( final var iterator = getProperties(); iterator.hasNext(); )
430        {
431            final var property = iterator.next();
432            if( !property.isOnCLI() ) continue CLIPropertiesLoop;
433
434            //---* Create the value handler *----------------------------------
435            builder.add(
436                    """
437                    
438                    /*
439                     * CLI definition for Property &quot;$L&quot;.
440                     */
441                    """, property.getPropertyName()
442                )
443                .addStatement( "$L = $L()", handlerName, composeValueHandlerCreation( property ) );
444
445            //---* Create the CLI definition *---------------------------------
446            final var usage = property.getCLIUsage().orElse( null );
447            final var usageKey = property.getCLIUsageKey().orElse( null );
448            final var metaVar = property.getCLIMetaVar().orElse( null );
449            final var required = Boolean.valueOf( property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_CLI_MANDATORY ) );
450            final var multiValued = Boolean.valueOf( property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_CLI_MULTIVALUED ) );
451            final var format = property.getCLIFormat().orElse( null );
452            if( property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT ) )
453            {
454                builder.addStatement( "$1L = new $2T( $3S, $4L, $5S, $6S, $7S, $8L, $9L, $10L, $11S )",
455                    definitionName,
456                    CLIArgumentDefinition.class,
457                    property.getPropertyName(),
458                    Integer.valueOf( property.getCLIArgumentIndex().orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalAnnotationError( format( MSG_NoArgumentIndex, property.getPropertyName() ) ) ) ),
459                    usage,
460                    usageKey,
461                    metaVar,
462                    required,
463                    handlerName,
464                    multiValued,
465                    format );
466            }
467            else if( property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_OPTION ) )
468            {
469                final var optionNames = property.getCLIOptionNames().orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalAnnotationError( format( MSG_NoOptionName, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
470                for( final var optionName : optionNames )
471                {
472                    if( !alreadyUsedOptions.add( optionName ) )
473                    {
474                        throw new IllegalAnnotationError( format( MSG_DuplicateOptionName, optionName, property.getPropertyName() ) );
475                    }
476                }
477                final var names = optionNames.stream()
478                    .map( s -> format( "\"%s\"", s ) )
479                    .collect( joining( ", ", "List.of( ", " )" ) );
480                builder.addStatement( "$1L = new $2T( $3S, $4L, $5S, $6S, $7S, $8L, $9L, $10L, $11S )",
481                    definitionName,
482                    CLIOptionDefinition.class,
483                    property.getPropertyName(),
484                    names,
485                    usage,
486                    usageKey,
487                    metaVar,
488                    required,
489                    handlerName,
490                    multiValued,
491                    format );
492            }
493            else
494            {
495                throw new IllegalAnnotationError( format( MSG_InvalidCLIType, property.getPropertyName() ) );
496            }
497            builder.addStatement( "$N.add( $L )", registry, definitionName );
498        }
499        addConstructorCode( builder.build() );
500    }   //  doBuild()
501
502    /**
503     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the class for the value handler for the given
504     *  property.} If returning
505     *  {@link Optional#empty()} empty},
506     *  an instance of
507     *  {@link SimpleCmdLineValueHandler}
508     *  must be used that will be instantiated with the
509     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter}
510     *  retrieved by a call to
511     *  {@link PropertySpec#getStringConverterClass()}.</p>
512     *
513     *  @param  property    The property.
514     *  @return An instance of
515     *      {@link Optional}
516     *      that holds the respective type name.
517     */
518    private final Optional<TypeName> retrieveValueHandlerClass( final PropertySpec property )
519    {
520        var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( property, "property" ).getCLIValueHandlerClass();
521        if( retValue.isEmpty() )
522        {
523            final var handlerClass = m_HandlerClasses.get( property.getPropertyType() );
524            if( nonNull( handlerClass ) )
525            {
526                retValue = Optional.of( handlerClass );
527            }
528        }
529        ifDebug( a ->
530        {
531            final var propertyName = ((PropertySpec) a [0]).getPropertyName();
532            final var propertyType = ((PropertySpec) a [0]).getPropertyType().toString();
533            //noinspection unchecked
534            final var handlerClass = Objects.toString( ((Optional<TypeName>) a [1]).orElse( null ) );
535            return format( "property: %1$s%n\tpropertyType: %2$s%n\thandlerClass: %3$s", propertyName, propertyType, handlerClass );
536        }, property, retValue );
537
538        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
539        return retValue;
540    }   //  retrieveValueHandlerClass()
541}
542//  class CLIBeanBuilder
543
544/*
545 *  End of File
546 */
